task.title: Setting notifications
task.shortdesc: You can define how you want to receive notifications for chats, announcements, and calls.

taskbody.context:
You can control the type of notification that you receive for each of the following.
1-to-1 chat messages
Group chat messages
New group chats
Announcements
Calls

step.cmd: Click the menu icon ( ) in the navigator and select Settings Notifications .
Click the down arrow next to the event that you want to set a notification and select the notification type.

plentry.pd: Receive a banner displayed at the top of the chat window.
Receive both an audio sound and banner.

step.cmd: When finished, click the return arrow () to return to Settings.
Click the return arrow () to return to the home page.
